name: Journey to Save Spark
description:
A mysterious villain has kidnapped Spark the Dog. Coots the Cat has enlisted the help of Charlie, a boomerang-wielding warrior to help him rescue his best bud. And of course by “help” we mean “do all the work”.  Coots is there to provide moral support.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • J - Boomerang
  • N/M - Volume control

There are also other actions which are unlocked during the game.

NOTE: The game can take a while to load the first time, so be patient and wait. If the audio starts but not the graphics, try refreshing.

Made for Ludwig's Game Jam with my friend 'Edshard'. I hope you guys enjoy this game!

Music Credits:

  • Main - Free MIDI rendition of "How High the Moon" 
  • Boss - Boss theme of "Shatterhand" re-instrumented from vgmusic MIDI by Steven C. King

If you want to support me, please check out my other game - May's Quest :)
